meanings.definition: The quality or state of being spongy.
meanings.sent1: The sponginesses of the sponge made it perfect for absorbing water.
meanings.sent2: I love the sponginesses of fresh bread when I press down on it.
meanings.sent3: The cake's sponginesses were so extreme that it bounced off the plate!
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm had a sponginesses that soaked up all the joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The mattress's sponginesses enveloped me in a cloud of comfort.

meanings.definition: The spongy nature or texture of something.
meanings.sent1: The sponginesses of the mushroom made it feel like a soft cushion.
meanings.sent2: The sponginesses of the carpet made it pleasant to walk on.
meanings.sent3: The dog's sponginesses made it seem like a walking sponge!
meanings.sent4: The forest floor's sponginesses welcomed each step like a gentle hug.
meanings.sent5: The bread's sponginesses reminded me of a fluffy cloud in my mouth.
